text:
Automata (http://www.getautomata.com/) | London, UK | ONSITE | Front end, Rails, C++, Embedded C, robotics engineers.

Automata are a growing robotics startup developing lightweight, low cost industrial robots in central London.

We're looking for developers and engineers for all aspects of our stack, from our web based front end, our Rails based web APIs, our C++ linux based embedded system and embedded C on our motor controllers. We're also looking for electronics and mechanical engineers.

Contact us at info@getautomata.com
